text: Futhi (wabathethelela) labo abathathu ababesalele ngemumva kwaze kwaba ilapho umhlaba njengoba umkhulu kangaka uncipha kubona nemiphefumulo yabo yancipha futhi babecabanga ukuthi ayikho indawo yokubalekela uMvelinqangi ngaphandle kokubalekela kuyena ngakho- ke wabathethelela ukuze bacele intethelelo, ngempela uMvelinqangi ungothethelelayo onomusa
